How to load pre-processed .txt data and use it for training convolutional networks?

I have a lot of '.txt' (pre-processed) files related to C3D and I need to use this to train and test while using CNN model. How does one go about this? Most of data in each .txt files are formatted like this: {0.00001478 0.00000006 0.00000133 0.00000038 0.00000001 0.00000001 0.00000000 0.00000001 0.00000004 0.00000011 0.00000000 0.00000002 0.00095226 0.00005343 0.00000002 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000342 0.00000002 0.00000036 0.00000000 0.00000046 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00001069 0.00000000 0.00007515 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000009 0.00000000 0.01169860 0.00000017 0.00000000 0.00000010 0.00000113 0.00000472 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000003 0.00000150 0.00001475 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000023 0.00000005 0.00000011 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00001333 0.00000000 0.00000002 0.00000017 0.00000076 0.00000051 0.00000015 0.00000440 0.00000001 0.00000079 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000008 0.00000000 0.00000001 0.00000002 0.98503888 0.00000013 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00208691 0.00000000 0.00000003 0.00000051 0.00000001 0.00001191 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000001 0.00000001 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000003 0.00000000 0.00000001 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000021 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000000 0.00000027 0.00000675}
